 2024-10452024-09-20PCH
ActNational Arts Centre Act
PrecisAppointment of HEATHER BALA EDWARDS of Calgary, Alberta, to be a member of the Board of Trustees of the National Arts Centre Corporation, to hold office during pleasure for a term of four years.
